subject: Partnership Proposal â€” Joint Product Development
body:
I am writing to propose a strategic partnership between Innovate Corp and Watson Enterprises for the joint development of our next-generation analytics platform.

After reviewing your company's impressive work in data visualization, I believe a collaboration would be mutually beneficial. Our team brings deep expertise in real-time data processing, while your team excels at intuitive user interfaces.

The proposed partnership would involve shared development resources for a 12-month period, with an equal revenue split on the resulting product. We have prepared a detailed proposal document outlining the technical architecture, timeline, and financial projections.

I would welcome the opportunity to discuss this in person. Please let me know if you are available for a meeting in the coming weeks.
ps: I have attached the full proposal document for your review. Feel free to reach out at any time.
